definition: (of an organization that has a duty of care) to give financial support to relatives of sb who has died or suffered serious injury
to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor

sentences.english: Some local businessmen proposed to raise a comfort fund for the earthquake victims.
sentences.chinese: 當地一些商人提議向地震受害者籌集撫卹金。

sentences.english: He has a discompetency pension from the government.
sentences.chinese: 他擁有一筆政府發的傷殘撫卹金。

sentences.english: The new insurance rules speculate that the disabled FOR the public benefit are to receive more money.
sentences.chinese: 新的保險條例規定因公傷殘者將得到更多的撫卹金。

sentences.english: Your death benefit is the amount of life insurance plus the policy Account Value.
sentences.chinese: 你的死亡撫卹金是人壽保險和保險單賬價值的總量。

sentences.english: Universal allows you to raise or lower your premiums and resulting cash balance.
sentences.chinese: 萬能型允許你隨意調高或調低保費和死亡撫卹金。

sentences.english: The government ritual buries died generals and the soldiers, comforts them family member.
sentences.chinese: 政府禮葬死亡將士，撫卹其家屬。

sentences.english: A fund will be set up for the dead men's families.
sentences.chinese: 撫卹死難工家屬的基金會即將建立起來。

sentences.english: He has a disability pension from the government.
sentences.chinese: 他領有一筆政府發的傷殘撫卹金。

sentences.english: Many factories compensate their workers if they are hurt at work.
sentences.chinese: 對工人工傷，許多工廠都撫卹賠償。
